definitions.definition: Any of several perennial composite plants, especially of genera Cirsium , Carduus , Cynara , or Onopordum , having prickly leaves and showy flower heads with prickly bracts .
This plant seen as the national emblem of Scotland .
An image of this plant used as a charge .
The Order of the Thistle , or membership thereof.

main_definition: Any of several perennial composite plants, especially of genera Cirsium , Carduus , Cynara , or Onopordum , having prickly leaves and showy flower heads with prickly bracts .
secondary_definitions: This plant seen as the national emblem of Scotland .
( heraldry ) An image of this plant used as a charge .
The Order of the Thistle , or membership thereof.
